import React from "react"; import Nav from "./Nav"; import "./Itemdetails.css"; import { Resultcontent } from "./Maincontents"; import LocationMap from "./components/LocationMap" class Itemdetails extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.handleClick = this.handleClick.bind(this); this.state = { location: null, resultcontent: Resultcontent, props: props.match, clicked: false, searchQuery: "", }; } fav = (item) => { this.setState({ clicked: !this.state.clicked, }); }; handleSearchChange = (event) => { this.setState({ searchQuery: event.target.value }); } handleClick = () => { const { searchQuery } = this.state; if (searchQuery) { const apiKey = "AIzaSyDLA3nKBXB3YQjcxzlW-BLj8AgXl3VVArs"; const url = `https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/place/findplacefromtext/json?key=${apiKey}&input=${searchQuery}&inputtype=textquery&fields=name,geometry`; fetch(url) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { if (data.status === "OK" && data.candidates.length > 0) { const { name, geometry: { location } } = data.candidates[0]; this.setState({ location: { name, lat: location.lat, lng: location.lng }, clicked: true }); } else { alert("Location not found!"); } }) .catch(error => console.error(error)); } }; render() { const { location, clicked } = this.state; const items = this.state.resultcontent[this.state.props.params.id]; return (

{items.title}

★{" "} {items.rating} ·{" "} {items.location}, Odisha · {items.price}

{items.type}

{items.smalldescription}

Report this listing

Enhanced Experience

{/* This host committed to Airbnb's 5-step enhanced cleaning process. */}


Outstanding hospitality

{/* Few guests complimented {items.host} for outstanding hospitality.. */}


Cancellation policy

{/* Add your trip dates to get the cancellation details for this stay. */}

Wifi

Personal care and attention

Transport by private air-conditioned car

All sightseeing with private local guides

Location

{items.location}, Odisha.

{location && (

)}

); } } export default Itemdetails;
